title: [GAMEPLAY] Mafia Jinx voice taunts aren't working
body:
I've encountered this several times now, at first I thought it might just be my computer or I might have accidentally switched off the champions talks. But every time I use CTRL+ 1,2,3 and 4 I get no voice coming out of her taunts. However the only one that is working is the sound from her dance to "Get Jinxed". I found that all the taunts are working when I play her with her classic skin. Also all of Mafia Jinx's movement lines seem to be working alright, it only seems to be the taunts, although I haven't tried the taunts with the chat commands so I'm not sure if it works there or not. 

I also saw that other people have reported her voice taunts aren't working on other servers, I hope it's not just me. I hope Rito can fix this :)

replies.body:
I also noticed something similar with Mordekiaser, but only if I use a voice command in succesion. He does the movement, but no sound. Gotta wait a little bit between each one.

Is that also some sort of bug?

Hey Akira Heroga,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and have a fix!
okay! glad to know its being worked on :D
